price: Shin, ba ka gani ba cẽwa Mun saki shaiɗanu* a kan kãfirai sunã shũshũta su ga zunubi shũshũtãwa?
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا ٱلشَّيَٰطِينَ عَلَى ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ تَؤُزُّهُمۡ أَزّٗا
footnotes: * Idan shaiɗanu sun ga mai wa'azin gaskiya, sai su dinga shũshũta mabiyansu dõmin su yi faɗa da mai wa'azin, dõmin kada su saurare shi har su gãne ɓatarsu. Shaidan shi ne mai ɓatar da wani, mutum ne kõ aljani.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alam tara annā arsalnā al-shayāṭīna ʿalā al-kāfirīna ta-uzzuhum azzan
